divs: sighting detailsthese events are taking place in margarita island, off the coast of venezuela in the southernmost part of the caribbean sea. i was sitting in a waterfront home with a friend, looking at the night sky while my wife was inside in the bedroom, it was a very clear night full of stars when out of nowhere, a very bright light, resembling the headlight of a car, just suddenly appears above the horizon. this happened in front of my eyes. while we stood in awe and shock wondering what could that light be and just where it had come from, the light started moving up in a 45 degree angle and it was flying faster as the seconds went by. after it reached a certain altitude, the object changed direction and it started to head our way. as soon as it changed direction, i no longer saw one bright light, it was now three lights, with the exact same distance separated from each other, the light in the center was a white light while the right light was flashing red and the left light was flashing green. they were flashing at a very high speed. i knew we were not looking at an airplane. it was flying right into our direction and was flying low. as it flew almost over us i could now clearly see its shape, it was a perfect diamond, and from this angle i now saw four lights, one in every corner of the diamond plus one in the center that was brighter than those in the points. as it flew over us, i was amazed that this object was absolutely silent!!! if it would have been a plane, obviously we would have heard the loud roar of the jet engines. i then ran in the house to get my wife, who joined me outside for further viewing. about 20 minutes later, the object flew back from the direction it had gone earlier. that same night, from the excitement of what we had just seen, we stayed up watching the sky until about midnight and we saw five more of these objects. they all have one thing in common, they come from the east and fly west. some time later, they fly back eastward from the west. since that night on 12\25\09, we have witnessed many more recurrent ufos plus other lights that hover or levitate just over the water, say 3-4 ft over the surface. these light shows are very amazing and impressive, as up to sixteen lights gather over the sea and flash, change colors, shapes....all in what i think is a constant communication with each other. these events are taking place almost in a daily basis, i am urgently contacting your organization to invite you to come here and document these truly amazing events for yourselves. i can take you to the sites for the best viewing at the best viewing times. i am very serious and i am not interested in wasting your time nor mine. please contact me as soon as possible. if i do not hear from you within 48 hours i will contact you by telephone. i really need you to document what is happening here, and as i said before, this is happening almost every night. thank you for your prompt attention to this very important matter. regards, thomas colmenares
